summary: AFTER THE 36,000 MILE WARRANTY, 250 MILES OVER TO BE EXACT. THE ABS PUMP KEPT RUNNING AFTER I SHUT THE ENGINE OFF. ESTIMATED REPAIR $1200.00. CALLED THE CHEVY DEALERSHIP(BEN MYNATT OF CONCORD, NC) AND THEY EVEN SAID THAT THEY WAS HAVING A PROBLEM WITH THE ABS PUMPS FAILING ON THE SILVERADOS. ATTEMPTED TO CONTACT THE MAIN OFFICE FOR CHEVY AND THEY GIVE THE SAME RUNAROUND ABOUT HAVING PROBLEMS BUT WILL NOT FIX THE PROBLEM. SOMEBODY PLEASE EXPLAIN THIS PROBLEM OR IF THAT CHEVROLET WILL EVER MAKE A RECALL! ALSO FOR A GOOD NOTE- MY NEXT DOOR NEIGHBOR JUST FOUND OUT YESTERDAY HIS WENT OUT AS WELL!
